message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, 55/45 sounds fair considering the inflation
The inflation is working against you, Bob. I'll be generous and take the deal you offered last round.
Inflation is biting, I need a bit more. 58/42 is my new proposal
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm moving closer to your demands, but this is my final offer.
